Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a brown pottery ribbed vessel, fabric partially grey in section, the interior is covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of four lines of Coptic text written in black ink, smudged.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393328) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393328)
